result.arabic_text: لَّوۡلَآ إِذۡ سَمِعۡتُمُوهُ ظَنَّ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتُ بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا وَقَالُواْ هَٰذَآ إِفۡكٞ مُّبِينٞ
result.translation: 12. Lab-moominiin kee say- moominiinik mariiy mara siinik kayrih macah dareemewee, woo dirab toobben waqdi, kayrih tet dareemaanam Qeysha cakkisitak tenek, kaadu ah baxxaqqa-le diraabay Nabii buxah-ina Qeyshal heeni macah axceweenii?
